title: 李文亮醫生   (12/30/2019 - 冠状病毒感染确定了) died !!

replies.msg:
李文亮醫生 died !!

"2019年12月30日下午，李文亮医生在同学群里提到，“华南水果海鲜市场确诊了7例SARS”“最新消息是冠状病毒感染确定了，正在进行病毒分型”。2020年1月3日，李文亮收到警方的训诫书，训诫书显示，其言论被认定不属实，“如果继续违法行为，将受到法律制裁”。"
https://s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9D%8E%E6%96%87%E4%BA%AE%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%E5%8E%BB%E4%B8%96%23

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZizDqz6jKiw

Mr. Siu explained:
1) Risk of spreading/getting the disease when workers resumed working in big China cities.
2) Many big china cities are in serious shortage of supplies.
3) How China "manually" pump loads of money to support stock market !
4) Result: risk of coming high inflation in China!
5) Risk of spreading out coronavirus from workers in HK Logistics industry.
